scripts.x: hc s clean && pnpm build:happ && UI_PORT=5173 concurrently "pnpm --filter ./ui dev" "pnpm start:happ"
scripts.start:happ: echo "starting with admin $VITE_ADMIN_PORT" && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s -f=$VITE_ADMIN_PORT --piped generate workdir/deepkey.happ --run=$VITE_APP_PORT -a deepkey network mdns
scripts.network: hc s clean && pnpm run build:happ && UI_PORT=5173 concurrently "pnpm --filter ./ui dev" "pnpm launch:happ" holochain-playground
scripts.test: pnpm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && pnpm test --filter tests
scripts.test:sweet: pnpm run build:happ && set -x && RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo test -- --nocapture
scripts.launch:happ: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n ${AGENTS:-1} workdir/deepkey.happ --ui-port ${UI_PORT:-5173} network mdns
scripts.package: pnpm run build:happ && pnpm run package --filter ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: pnpm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
